item.title: Go JWT Authentication with keycloak
item.description: Recently I was working on a React project with Go backend using Gin web framework. Keycloak was the authentication mechanism for the frontend; I also wanted to secure the backend using JSON Web Tokens which was provided by Keycloak on every login. Setup for jwt verification in Go was easy.
